message.content:
To identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period, we need to find the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) value from the income statement since it represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period.

From the income statement given:

| Account          | Amount   | Date       |
|------------------|----------|------------|
| Cost of Goods Sold| 543370.00| 2024-02-04 |

This is the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Hence, the extracted value is 543370.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "543370.00"}}
```
